analyses.title: Access or create analyses. Creation can only be done inside a submission envelope

projects.title: Access or create projects. Creation can only be done inside a submission envelope

bundleManifests.title: Access or create bundle manifests (describing which submitted contents went into which bundle in the datastore)

samples.title: Access or create samples. Creation can only be done inside a submission envelope

assays.title: Access or create assays. Creation can only be done inside a submission envelope

files.title: Access or create, within a submission envelope, a new assay

submissionEnvelopes.title: Access or create new submission envelopes
